node.text:
Sometimes the simplest things mean the most. Your kind words mean a lot to us. We are beyond thrilled to have had the opportunity to host you in this idyllic and historic city. Extremely glad that your holiday at The Raviz was a memorable one. We at The Raviz Ashtamudi look forward to having you again at our property. Come back soon!
